movement.violin: \relative e' { \cueDuringWithClef #"pianoUpMvmtI" #DOWN #"mezzosoprano" R1 \cueDuringWithClef #"pianoUpMvmtI" #UP #"mezzosoprano" R1 \cueDuringWithClef #"pianoUpMvmtI" #DOWN #"mezzosoprano" R1 \cueDuring #"pianoUpMvmtI" #UP R1 \cueDuring #"pianoUpMvmtI" #DOWN R1 \cueDuring #"pianoUpMvmtI" #UP R1 | <d d'>2\f^\solo r8 a'\upbow f g | a\<( d) f8.( f16-.) <f bes, g>4\f\>( <e bes>8) r\! | << {\voiceOne a,2\downbow} \new Voice {\voiceTwo <e a,>4 r} >> \oneVoice r8 bes'16--\downbow bes--\< gis-- gis-- a-- a-- | cis8:16-- e8:16-- bes'8:16-- a8:16-- <g a, d,>4\f\>( <f a,>8) r8 | e2~\p\downbow e8 cis( a g) | f2~ f8 a\<( d-2 f-4) | e2~-3\> e8\! 8) a\<\downbow( c f\!) | a4( g f e) | g\>( f~\! 8) e\upbow\p\<( f\> d\!) | %% 44 bes2~ 8 e\<( f\> c\!) | a2~ 8 cis( d bes) | cis,4\<( d\!) a'4.\>( g8\!) \mark \default | f16\downbow\f( g a f) c'4-> c,16( d e c) f8-.( a-.) | \time 2/4 g8-. c-. a4->\downbow | \time 4/4 f'16\downbow( g a f) c'4-> c,16( d e c) f8-.( a-.) | \time 2/4 g8-. c-. a4->\downbow | \time 4/4 g2\downbow\ff c \bar "||" %% 52 <f, a,>4 r r2 | \cueDuringWithClef #"pianoUpMvmtI" #UP #"mezzosoprano" R1 \cueDuringWithClef #"pianoUpMvmtI" #DOWN #"mezzosoprano" R1 \cueDuring #"pianoUpMvmtI" #UP R1 \mark \default | g2~\p\downbow^\solo 8 e( c bes) | a2~ 8 c\<( f a) | g2~\> 8\! e( c bes) | a2~ 8 a\<( c f) | e2~\> 8\! cis( a g) | f2~ 8 a\<( d f\!) | e2~ 8 cis\>( a g\!) | f2~ 8 a( d f) | ees\p d16\<( ees) g8 fis16( g) bes8\espressivo\> a16( bes) ees,8 d16( ees\!) | d8 cis16\<( d) f8 e16( f) a8\espressivo\> gis16( a) d,8 cis16( d\!) | << \repeat percent 2 { f8-> e16-- d-- cis8-> d16-- e-- \tuplet 3/2 4 { f8-> e-> d-> cis-> d-> e->} } s8\f\downbow >> | f8 e16( d) a'4~ 8 f\>( d a\!) | f4~ \tuplet 3/2 { 8 e-- d--} b4( cis) \mark \default | d16--\downbow e-- f-- d-- a'8-. d,-. <a' f'>-> d,-. <a' a'>-> d,-. | %% 71 g,16-- a-- bes-- g-- d'8-. g,-. <d' bes'>-> g,-. <d' d'>-> g,-. | a16-- b-- cis-- a-- e'8-. a,-. <e' cis'>-> a,-. <cis' a'>-> a,-. | d'16--\downbow e-- f-- g-- a-- g-- f-- e-- d-- c-- bes-- a-- g-- f-- e-- d-- | fis-.\p\downbow g-. a-. fis-. d8-. d'-. fis16-. g-. a-. fis-. g8-. g,-. | e16-. f-. g-. e-. c8-. c'-. e16-. f-. g-. e-. f8-. c-. | r8 bes,\ff\upbow <f' d'> bes, r g\upbow <e' d'> g, | r8 a\upbow <f' d'> a, r a\upbow <e' cis'> a, \mark \default | d16\downbow e f d a'4-> a,16 b cis a d8-.( f-.) | \time 2/4 e8-. a-. f4->\downbow | %% 80 \time 4/4 d'16\downbow e f d a'4-> a,16 b cis a d8-.( f-.) | \time 2/4 e8-. a-. f4->\downbow | \time 4/4 <d e>2\sfz\downbow <a' cis,>\sfz | <d, d,> r8 a->\upbow f-> g-> | a8->( d->) f8.( f16-.) f4( e8) r | bes'4->\upbow( a8) r bes4->\downbow( a8) r | <d, d,>2->\ff\upbow << \repeat unfold 2 <d d,>4-> {s4\downbow s\upbow} >> | <d d,>1->\fermata\downbow \bar "|." }

\relative d' { \cueDuring #"pianoUpMvmntII" #UP R1*3 | r2 r4 d8\upbow\p( e) | fis4( a-4) r d,8\upbow( fis) | %% 6 e4( b) r b8( d) | cis4( a') e( g) | fis( a) r d,8\upbow( e) | %% 9 fis4( d') r d,8\open( fis-2) | e4( b) r b8( d) | cis4( a') e( fis) | fis16( e d8~ 2) b'8\upbow\<( cis) \mark \default | d4\mf cis b fis | %% 14 g2( fis4) b8( cis) | d8 cis e d~( d cis) b-- fis-- | g4.\>( a16 g) fis2 | d'2\p\downbow( cis4. a8) | b1 | e2( cis4. a8) | fis'1 | a2\downbow fis4.( d8) | b'2~ b8 g\>( e b\!) | cis2.~\trill\<( 8\> b16 cis\!) | d2~\upbow 8 a\upbow\<( d fis) \mark \default | a2~\f \tuplet 3/2 4 {8 g-- fis-- fis( e dis)} | b'2~ 8 g( e fis) | g2~ \tuplet 3/2 4 {g8 fis-- e-- e( d cis)} | a'2~ 8 fis\upbow( d e) | << \repeat unfold 2 {fis4( a) r gis8\upbow( eis) } { s1 | s4-1 s-1 s s8-4} >> | fis4-3\dim( a-4\flageolet) dis,-1( a'-4\flageolet) | e-2( a-4\flageolet) r d,,8\open\p\upbow( e-1) \mark \default | fis4( d'\flageolet) r d,8( fis) | e4( b) r b8( d) | cis4( a') e( g) | fis( a) r d,8\upbow( e) | fis4( d') r d,8( fis) | e4( b) r b8( d) | cis4( a') e( fis) | fis16\p\downbow( e d8~ 4 fis2) | a2( b4 d) | e2 g4.( fis8) | 1\pp\fermata \bar "|." }

piano.down: \relative f' { \clef "alto" <fis d>2 <fis d b> | <fis cis a fis> <fis d b> | << {\voiceOne e2 g4.( fis8)} \new Voice {\voiceTwo <cis a>1} >> \oneVoice | <d fis a>2. r4 | \clef "bass" << { \voiceTwo <d, a d,>2 \change Staff="up" <fis' d a> \change Staff="down" | <e, b e,> \change Staff="up" <g' e b> \change Staff="down" | <cis,, a d,> \change Staff="up" <a'' g e> \change Staff="down" | <d,, a d,> \change Staff="up" <a'' fis d> \change Staff="down" | <d,, a d,> \change Staff="up" <d'' a fis> \change Staff="down" | <e,, b d,> \change Staff="up" <e'' b g> \change Staff="down" | <cis,, a d,> \change Staff="up" <g''' cis, a> \change Staff="down"| <d,, a d,> \change Staff="up" <fis'' d a>4 \change Staff="down" \oneVoice r4 | } { \repeat unfold 2 {s4\sustainOn s2 s8 s\sustainOff} s4\sustainOn s2 s4\sustainOff \repeat unfold 4 {s4\sustainOn s2 s8 s\sustainOff} s2\sustainOn s4\sustainOff } >> b,,,,2\mf( <b b'>) | \repeat percent 3 {b( b')} | <d a d,>2\p <fis d a> | <b, g d> <g' e b> | <cis, a d,> <g' e cis a> | \repeat percent 2 {<d a d,> <fis d a>} | <b, g d> <g' e b> | <cis, a g d> <g' cis, a> | \clef "bass_8" <d a fis d>( d,,4) r | \clef "bass" <a'' fis dis>2 <fis' dis c a> | <e b g> <b g e> | <bes g e cis> <e cis bes g> | <d a fis> <a fis d> | \repeat percent 2 {<cis a fis cis>4 <a' fis cis> <b gis eis cis>2} | <fis fis,>2 <bis, bis,> | \repeat unfold 2 <cis cis,> | <d a fis d>1 | <e b g d> | <cis a d,> | <d a d,> | <d a fis d> | <e b gis d> | <cis a g d> | \clef "alto" <fis' d>2 <fis d b> | <fis cis a fis> <fis d b> | << {\voiceOne e2 g4.( fis8)} \new Voice {\voiceTwo <cis a>1} >> \oneVoice | <fis d a d,>1\fermata\arpeggio \bar "|." }

piano.down: \relative a, { r4 <a a,> | r <bes bes,> | r <b b,> | r <c c,> | <cis cis,>8 cis8 4-> | d8 d d4-> | g,8 r a r | d,8 r d' r | %% 9 cis8 cis cis4 | d8 d d4 | g,8 r a r | d,4 r \repeat volta 2 { g'2 | f8 f f4 | bes2 | a8 a <bes f bes,>4\fermata | cis,8 cis cis4-> | d8 d d4-> | g,8 r a r | } \alternative { {d,4 r} {<d' d,>8 r r4} } \bar "||" R2 | <d d,>4-> <f f,>-> | <a a,>-> r8 a16 g | %% 25 f16 g f e d8 r | R2 | <g, g,>4-> <bes bes,>-> | <d d,>-> r8 d16 c | bes c bes a g8 r \bar "||" \key d \major \repeat volta 2 { <a' e a,>4-> 4-> | R2 | <a fis d>4-> 4-> | R2 | cis,8 r a r | e' r a, r | d r a r | fis' r a, r | <b e,>4-- 4-- | r8 g' fis fis | fis, fis b4 } %% 41 << {\voiceOne b'4 ais | a gis | g fis | gis ais | b ais | a gis | g fis} \new Voice {\voiceTwo \repeat unfold 7 b,2} >> \oneVoice %% 48 <b b,>8 fis b,4 | R2 | <a'' e a,>8-> g fis e | R2 | <a d,>8-> fis e d | cis8 r a r | e' r a, r | d r a r | fis' r a, r | <b e,>4-- 4-- | R2 | <d g,>4-- 4-- | R2 | <f bes,>4-- 4-- | R2 | r4 <a, a,> | r <bes bes,> | r <b b,> | r <c c,> \bar "||" \key d \minor <cis cis,>8 8 4-> | <d d,>8 8 4-> | g,8 r a r | d r d, r | <cis' cis,>8 8 4-> | <d d,>8 8 4-> | g,8 r a r | <d d,>4 r | g2 | %% 76 f8 8 4 | bes2 | a8 <a f> <bes f bes,>4\fermata | <cis, cis,>4-> 4-> | e8 r a, r | <d d,>4 4 | f8 r a, r | cis8 r a r | e' r a, r | d r a r | f' r a, r | <g' d g,>4-> 4-> | r8 bes8 a a | <a a,>8 8 d,4 | \clef "bass_8" <bes bes,>4-> <a a,>-> | <d, d,>-> r \bar "|." }
